summaries.revert: Edit summary of reverts, use the {{username}}, {{reason}}, and $t(common:redwarn.signature) params as appropriate.
summaries.rollback: Same as above, but for rollback.
summaries.restore: Edit summary for restoring revisions. Use the {{revID}}, {{revUser}}, {{reason}}, and $t(common:redwarn.signature) params as appropriate.
